verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> unto יְדוּת֗וּן <WH3038> to Jeduthun מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David אַ֣ךְ <WH389> only אֶל־ <WH413> about אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> upon God דּֽוּמִיָּ֣ה <WH1747> waiteth נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> Truly my soul מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> at יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <WH3444> from him [cometh] my salvation

אַךְ־ <WH389> only ה֣וּא <WH1931> he צ֭וּרִי <WH6697> He only [is] my rock וִֽישׁוּעָתִ֑י <WH3444> and my salvation מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <WH4869> [he is] my defence לֹא־ <WH3808> not אֶמּ֥וֹט <WH4131> moved רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> I shall not be greatly

עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֤נָה ׀ <WH575> How תְּהֽוֹתְת֣וּ <WH2050> How long will ye imagine mischief עַל <WH5921> and אִישׁ֮ <WH376> A man תְּרָצְּח֪וּ <WH7523> you may murder כֻ֫לְּכֶ֥ם <WH3605> all כְּקִ֥יר <WH7023> wall נָט֑וּי <WH5186> all of you as a bowing גָּ֝דֵ֗ר <WH1447> fence הַדְּחוּיָֽה׃ <WH1760> [shall ye be and as] a tottering

אַ֤ךְ <WH389> only מִשְּׂאֵת֨וֹ ׀ <WH7613> from his excellency יָעֲצ֣וּ <WH3289> They only consult לְהַדִּיחַ֮ <WH5080> to cast [him] down יִרְצ֪וּ <WH7521> they delight כָ֫זָ֥ב <WH3577> in lies בְּפִ֥יו <WH6310> with their mouth יְבָרֵ֑כוּ <WH1288> they bless וּ֝בְקִרְבָּ֗ם <WH7130> inwardly יְקַלְלוּ־ <WH7043> but they curse סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
אַ֣ךְ <WH389> only לֵ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> thou only upon God דּ֣וֹמִּי <WH1826> wait נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> My soul כִּי־ <WH3588> for מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> For תִּקְוָתִֽי׃ <WH8615> for my expectation

אַךְ־ <WH389> only ה֣וּא <WH1931> he צ֭וּרִי <WH6697> He only [is] my rock וִֽישׁוּעָתִ֑י <WH3444> and my salvation מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <WH4869> [he is] my defence לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> I shall not be moved

עַל־ <WH5921> on אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> In God יִשְׁעִ֣י <WH3468> [is] my salvation וּכְבוֹדִ֑י <WH3519> and my glory צוּר־ <WH6697> the rock עֻזִּ֥י <WH5797> of my strength מַ֝חְסִ֗י <WH4268> [and] my refuge בֵּֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> [is] in God

בִּטְח֘וּ <WH982> Trust ב֤וֹ בְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵ֨ת ׀ <WH6256> in him at all times עָ֗ם <WH5971> [ye] people שִׁפְכֽוּ־ <WH8210> pour out לְפָנָ֥יו <WH6440> before לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <WH3824> your heart אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> him God מַחֲסֶה־ <WH4268> [is] a refuge לָּ֣נוּ סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> for us Selah

אַ֤ךְ ׀ <WH389> are only הֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> of low degree [are] vanity בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> afflicted אָדָם֮ <WH120> man כָּזָ֪ב <WH3577> of high degree [are] a lie בְּנֵ֫י <WH1121> afflicted אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> [and] men בְּמֹאזְנַ֥יִם <WH3976> in the balance לַעֲל֑וֹת <WH5927> to be laid הֵ֝֗מָּה <WH1992> like מֵהֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> [lighter] than vanity יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> they [are] altogether

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּבְטְח֣וּ <WH982> Trust בְעֹשֶׁק֮ <WH6233> not in oppression וּבְגָזֵ֪ל <WH1498> in robbery אַל־ <WH408> not תֶּ֫הְבָּ֥לוּ <WH1891> and become not vain חַ֤יִל ׀ <WH2428> if riches כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יָנ֑וּב <WH5107> increase אַל־ <WH408> not תָּשִׁ֥יתוּ <WH7896> set לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> not your heart

אַחַ֤ת ׀ <WH259> once דִּבֶּ֬ר <WH1696> hath spoken אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God שְׁתַּֽיִם־ <WH8147> twice ז֥וּ <WH2098> this שָׁמָ֑עְתִּי <WH8085> have I heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> That עֹ֝֗ז <WH5797> that power לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> [belongeth] unto God

וּלְךָֽ־ אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> Also unto thee O Lord חָ֑סֶד <WH2617> [belongeth] mercy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> You תְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> for thou renderest לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to every man כְּֽמַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <WH4639> according to his work
